### Tender Information

This notice is for a Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) for the rental of equipment, machinery, and tools. The contract period is anticipated to be two (2) years with the possibility of two (2) one (1) year extensions.

### Procurement Method

The tender will be conducted on a competitive traditional method.

### Requested Services

Canadian Heritage requires rental services for construction equipment and tools to support major events and operations.
